description: Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) has identified the need to acquire a robust, cloud-based, turnkey Learning Management System (LMS) that meets all the needs expressed in this document. ISC develops self-learning tools ranging from eLesson (SCORM packages), to Webinars (pre-recorded videos,system demonstrations) and PDF guides. ISC is seeking a contractor with a Software as a Service (SaaS) application to host a solution that can be configured t...
full_summary:
**Cloud-Based Learning Management System – Software as a Service**

Solicitation Number: 1000248415
Reference Number: PW-23-01021625
Amendment Number: 3
Tender Closing Date: February 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST

**Notice Description**

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) invites proposals from qualified vendors to provide a cloud-based, turnkey Learning Management System (LMS) that meets the needs and requirements outlined in this solicitation. The proposed solution must enable the management, delivery, tracking, reporting, and evaluation of all training and learning content.

**Key Requirements**

* The proposed solution must be a Software as a Service (SaaS) application hosted in Canada
* The solution must be configured to meet the specific requirements of ISC
* The contractor must deliver, set up, and configure the cloud LMS in Canada
* All data, including data backups, must remain within Canada

** attachments**

The following documents are available for download:

* Amendment 2 (PDF)
* Amendment 1 (PDF)
* Amendment 1 (DOCX)
* QA 1-6 (PDF)
* QA 1-8 (PDF)
* QA 1-9 (PDF)
* RFP (PDF)
* RFP AMD 2 (PDF)
* RFP AMD 1 (PDF)
* RFP AMD 1 (DOCX)
* RFP MOD 2 (PDF)
* RFP MOD 1 (PDF)
* RFP (PDF)

**Evaluation Criteria**

The evaluation of proposals will be carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Trade Agreement Act and will be based on the following criteria:

* Compliance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation
* Technical merit of the proposed solution
* Experience and qualifications of the vendor

**Contact Information**

For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Bruno Paradis
e-mail: [bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca)

**Important Dates**

* Tender Closing Date: February 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EST
* End of tendering process: as indicated in the solicitation document

You can find the updated entry on the Canada Buys website, under the reference number 1000248415. 

Please make adjustments as you see fit to make sure the rewritten entry consistently uses a clear and direct writing style throughout
